name: buutticodingtask
description: * [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) * [SQLite](https://www.sqlite.org/) ## Installation * Install Node.js and npm   ```   curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_17.x | sudo -E bash -   sudo apt-get install -y nodejs   ``` * Install SQLite   ```   npm install -g sqlite --save   ```
author: Eric Telkkälä
